name: Rise of the Rabbits
overview: Though the title is a pun on Rise of the Robots, this is a clone of Dynablaster. Up to four players may compete in a hunt for four stars hidden inside blocks, blowing up the blocks with their bombs — or blowing each other up. There are various other items on the screen, such as extra bombs, liquor bottles which reverse the controls, a gun to shoot blocks, speed-ups, a stop sign that halts all other players and a skul that makes you lose all you've picked up. The game is only 32 kilobyte large, made for the 32k game competition at the Mekka & Symposium demo party in Fallingbostel, Germany.
